ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Gordon on xp
ygData.msgSnippet: He was referring back to a post I made a while ago, talking about the all hybrid group  I had had so much fun with in Karnor s.  (Mine was 2 rangers, 2pals,
ygData.messageBody:
He was referring back to a post I made a while ago, talking about the "all
hybrid group" I had had so much fun with in Karnor's. (Mine was 2 rangers,
2pals, sk and me if I remember correctly). My xp was as good as it ever is
in a karnor's pickup group (which is to say pretty bad, I hate that
place...).
----- Original Message -----
From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, January 25, 2001 11:51 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Gordon on xp


> err, that's not an all hybrid group. that's 2 hybrids (you, ranger) and 3
> pure melee (warrior, 2 monks). you were killing things so fast because
you
> had the 3 pure melee high damage dealers. it was, as you say, and all
tank
> group though.
>
> Shada
>
